page.title: 12ADULT EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We moved to Urchfont in ,1980 because of my dad's work. He works as a music director with the west Wiltshire Young Musicians and is a senior instrumental teacher.What he does is he goes round schools teaching children the Cello.We used to live in Cornwall but there was a better job here so we moved.I liked it better in Cornwall. {by Timothy Monckton Before we moved to Urchfont we lived in one town and one village.The town was called Stevenage and then we moved to Shropshire.The village was called Edgemond.We moved down to Wiltshire because it was easier for my dad to get to the office in Newbury.He goes about once a week to the office.He sells and buys animals and organizes them to go to the slaughter house to be killed for meat.(For a live stock company)he goes out about 8:15 he
